titles.title: A resolution designating September 2020 as "National Spinal Cord Injury Awareness Month".
A resolution designating September 2020 as "National Spinal Cord Injury Awareness Month".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution designates September 2020 as National Spinal Cord Injury Awareness Month and expresses support for further research of treatments, therapies, and a cure for spinal cord injuries and individuals living with paralysis.
